author: Joe Namath
message: If you aren't going all the way, why go at all?
title: Thought of the day

author: Confucius
message: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
title: Thought of the day

author: Pierre Abelard
message: The beginning of wisdom is found in doubting; by doubting we come to the question, and by seeking we may come upon the truth.
title: Thought of the day

message: If I could reach up and hold a star for every time you've made me smile, the entire evening sky would be in the palm of my hand.
title: Thought of the day
